short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart tab organizer that auto-arranges tabs, limits tab count, and sorts bookmarks by month for a cleaner browser experience
short.zh_CN: 智能标签页管理工具：自动整理标签页位置、限制标签数量，并按月份自动归类书签，让您的浏览器保持整洁有序

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Bookmark Manager Extension

A powerful and intelligent Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience with smart bookmark management and tab control features.


Key Features:

1. One-Click Bookmarking
Instantly save your favorite websites with a single click
Smart icon indication shows whether the current page is bookmarked
Quick toggle between bookmarking and removing bookmarks

2. Automatic Tab Management
Intelligent control of open tabs (maximum 17 tabs)
Automatically manages tab overflow to prevent browser slowdown
Preserves important system tabs and pinned tabs

3. Smart Organization
Automatically organizes bookmarks by month
Creates a structured folder hierarchy for better organization
Maintains clean and organized bookmark collections

4. User-Friendly Interface
Clean and intuitive icon design
Visual feedback for bookmarked states
Seamless integration with Chrome's native interface

5. Efficient Tab Control
Automatic tab cleanup after inactivity
Smart tab positioning for frequently accessed pages
Prevents tab clutter and improves browser performance

6. Privacy and Security
Works with both HTTP and HTTPS websites
Respects browser privacy settings
No data collection or external dependencies

7. Performance Optimization
Lightweight background process
Minimal resource usage
Smooth operation without affecting browser speed

8. Cross-Platform Compatibility
Works across all Chrome-supported platforms
Consistent experience across devices
Supports multiple Chrome windows


This extension is perfect for:

Power users who frequently work with multiple tabs
Users who want to keep their bookmarks organized automatically
Anyone looking to improve their browsing efficiency
Professionals who need quick access to frequently visited sites


Version: 0.1.0 Permissions Required: Tabs, Bookmarks, Website Access
